title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8126.24 - Town of Perinton
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8126.24 - Town of Perinton

State Regulations
(a) Route 31
between the Monroe-Wayne county line and IR 490. (b) Route 96. Route 96 between I-490 (at

Bushnells Basin) and Route 250. (c) [Eff. until April 11, 1990, see subd. (c) below.] Turk Hill Road. Turk Hill

Road between Route 31 and a point 2.4+- miles north of Route 31. (c) [Eff. April 11, 1990, see subd. (c)
above.] [Repealed]
(d) Whitney

Road. Whitney Road between Turk Hill Road and a distance of 1.00+- mile west of

Turk Hill Road. (e) [Eff. until

Sept. 24, 1997, see also subd. (e) below.] Route 31F. Route 31F between Turk

Hill Road and the Monroe-Wayne county line. (e) [Eff. Sept. 24, 1997, see also subd. (e)
above.] Route 31F. Route 31F between Route I-490 and the Monroe-Wayne county
line in the Towns of Pittsford and Perinton, and the Village of

Fairport. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
8126.24

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
